forum.content:
I think there are less people can
understand what I say or what I
want to convey.

Because they have lower education
and lower Emotional management.

Many girl use app to chat online,
but usually say nothing,only have
silent or something like perfunctory.

Girl you need to ponder…
What connotation are u have?
What is your value?
Don't just like a dumb.
That is all, don't let others think you
are idiot or a dumb.
forum.title: Cynical
